author: cnbc.com
title: Cloud-based learning platform PluralSight raises expected IPO price range
text:
May 15 (Reuters) - Cloud-based technology learning platform PluralSight Inc on Tuesday raised the anticipated price range for its initial public offering by $2.
The company now expects its IPO to be priced between $12 and $14 per share, up from the prior $10 to $12 per share range. The offering size of 20.7 million shares was left unchanged. ( https://bit.ly/2KoeiWJ ) (Reporting by Nikhil Subba in Bengaluru; Editing by Bernard Orr)
